topic.title: Missing functions on ZeroVoat please fix it
topic.body:
1. Link option on text editor.

See http://test.org or "test" as link.Does not works.

2.Search function which the users can search the ZeroVoat topics.

3. Users can not delete own comments,topics,channels,.

4. Embed URL from IFS option not have on comments.

5.On text editor Link option,text color,underline,options It would be useful.

6. On IFS i can edit if i create a channel but i can not delete it!
topic.body_p: 1. Link option on text editor. See http://test.org or "test" as link.Does not works.2.Search function which the users can search the ZeroVoat topics.3. Users can not delete own comments,topics,channels,.4. Embed URL from IFS option not have on comments.5.On text editor Link option,text color,underline,options It would be useful.6. On IFS i can edit if i create a channel but i can not delete it!
